    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void calculateRoutingAdaptations​(Environment environment, SensorEnvironment sensorEnvironment)
    Calculate all the routingApplications of every mote in the environment before simulating It saves a hashmap where the keys are all the geopositions where there happens an adaptation of the path and the values is the changed path
    void clean​(int delete)
    Clean the cached routes and mote positions.

    Gives the amount of adaptations made for every mote
    java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,​Pair<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Long>> getAverageTimeForDecisionPerMote()
    Gives average time needed to make all decisions for every mote
    java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,​java.lang.Long> getMaxTime()

    Get a stored route for a specific mote.

    Handle a route request message by replying with (part of) the route to the requesting device.
    void handleRouteRequestWithoutNetwork​(UserMote mote, Environment environment, SensorEnvironment sensorEnvironment)
    Handles a route request without sending packets It gives directly the next part of the route to the mote
    protected java.util.List<org.jxmapviewer.viewer.GeoPosition> handleRouteRequestWithoutNetwork2​(UserMote mote, Environment environment, SensorEnvironment sensorEnvironment)
    Handles a route request without sending packets It calculates every adaptation that would be made before simulating the run visually This results in a clear view if there are a lot of cyclists in the environment
    void handleRouteRequestWithoutNetworkForRun​(UserMote mote, Environment environment, SensorEnvironment sensorEnvironment)
    Handles a route request without sending packets It gives directly the next part of the route to the mote This method is used for gathering experimental results It is used to visualise the result of using adaptations
    void handleRouteRequestWithoutNetworkForRun2​(UserMote mote, Environment environment, SensorEnvironment sensorEnvironment)
    Handles a route request without sending packets It gives directly the next part of the route to the mote This is for gathering all the predictive values of the air quality of a path calculated by the routing application Used for visualising the difference of the predictive values and effective values of the air- quality for a certain number of runs by using a boxplot
    void reset()
    Sets begintime back on 40000 ms
